biotools.summary: Novel software which uses only summary statistics and correlation structures estimated from a reference popluation, to i) impute the summary statistics at unmeasured eQTLs and ii) test for the joint effect of measured and imputed all eQTLs affecting a gene function/expression on a phenotype.

bioschemas.name: JEPEG
bioschemas.summary: Novel software which uses only summary statistics and correlation structures estimated from a reference popluation, to i) impute the summary statistics at unmeasured eQTLs and ii) test for the joint effect of measured and imputed all eQTLs affecting a gene function/expression on a phenotype.
